actions.text: Amendment SA 2860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2860 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Merkley. (consideration: CR 9/21/2012 S6611; text: CR 9/21/2012 S6611) To provide for the reassessment by the Secretary of Transportation of a determination that it is in the public interest to prohibit operators of civil aircraft of the United States from participating in the European Union's emissions trading scheme.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2860 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Merkley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To provide for the reassessment by the Secretary of Transportation of a determination that it is in the public interest to prohibit operators of civil aircraft of the United States from participating in the European Union's emissions trading scheme.
